title: Catwoman: Hunted
synopsis: After crashing a costume party to steal a highly sought-after emerald, Catwoman lands in the crosshairs of shadowy villains, Interpol and Batwoman.

title: TIGER & BUNNY - The Rising -
synopsis: New corporate leadership shakes up Tiger and Barnaby's partnership. Meanwhile, the city is hit by a series of incidents resembling a legendary curse.

title: TIGER & BUNNY - The Beginning -
synopsis: In a world where superhero work is commercialized, aging hero Wild Tiger must team up with the arrogant, younger Barnaby Brooks Jr. to take on a thief.

title: Bright: Samurai Soul
synopsis: In the early years of Japan's Meiji Restoration, a human ronin must unite with an orc assassin to save an elf orphan from their common adversary.

title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
synopsis: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

title: Monster Hunter: Legends of the Guild
synopsis: In a world where humans and fearsome monsters live in an uneasy balance, young hunter Aiden fights to save his village from destruction by a dragon.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho: The Movie
synopsis: When Koenma is kidnapped, Yusuke and the gang must deliver King Enma's all-powerful Golden Seal to Magma Valley in exchange for his safety.

title: One Piece Stampede
synopsis: Pirates across the globe converge at a festival to join the hunt for Gol D. Roger’s treasure, but his former crewmate has diabolical plans of his own.

title: Gintama: The Movie: The Final Chapter: Be Forever Yorozuya
synopsis: A time traveler sends Gintoki into the future, where mankind is on the verge of extinction and he must solve the mystery of his own death.

title: Gintama: The Movie
synopsis: In medieval Tokyo (then known as Edo), aging samurai Gintoki finds himself defending a Japan that has been invaded by aliens.

title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
synopsis: While putting their hero skills to use on the peaceful island of Nabu, the Class 1-A kids face a sudden attack from a formidable villain known as Nine.

title: Promare
synopsis: A brash firefighter faces off against a strong-willed, misunderstood pyrokinetic struggling to free his people â€“ with the Earth's fate on the line.

title: City Hunter: Shinjuku Private Eyes
synopsis: Ryo Saeba returns! The daughter of a recently deceased scientist seeks out the sweeper’s help when she’s targeted by a skilled team of mercenaries.

title: ROAD TO NINJA: NARUTO THE MOVIE
synopsis: The Masked Man sends Naruto and Sakura to an alternate reality where his parents are alive and hers are dead. Somehow they've got to get back.

title: Sol Levante
synopsis: A young warrior and her familiar search for the sacred place said to fulfill wishes. It's best not to anger the ancient guardians and spirits.

title: Altered Carbon: Resleeved
synopsis: On the planet Latimer, Takeshi Kovacs must protect a tattooist while investigating the death of a yakuza boss alongside a no-nonsense CTAC.

title: Dragon Quest Your Story
synopsis: Luca follows in his father's footsteps to rescue his mother from evil Ladja. Finding the heavenly hero who wields the Zenithian sword is his only hope.

title: Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel II. Lost Butterfly
synopsis: Shiro deepens his relationship with Sakura as he continues his fight in the Holy Grail War -- despite no longer being a Master.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
synopsis: A powerful young Saiyan and his father were exiled by the king long ago. Now freed, he wants his revenge on the king's son: Vegeta.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Movie: Pyramid of Light
synopsis: Yugi has defeated Kaiba, but he still wants a rematch. The reawakened Anubis manipulates them both into playing his Shadow Game to destroy the world.

title: Girls und Panzer der Film
synopsis: The girls of Ōarai High must face off against a formidable university team in a fierce tank battle to once again avoid closure of their school.

title: Persona 3 The Movie: #4 Winter of Rebirth
synopsis: Familiar with death, Makoto and his team are still stunned by revelations about Ryoji and the events of ten years ago. One final choice remains.

title: Persona 3 the Movie: #1 Spring of Birth
synopsis: After he transfers to Gekkoukan High, Makoto Yuki finds himself fighting alongside his classmates in the Velvet Room against the monstrous Shadows.

title: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes
synopsis: With Deku, All Might visits an old friend on the technologically advanced I-Island, when a gang of villains takes the whole city hostage.

title: The End of Evangelion
synopsis: Seele orders an all-out attack on NERV, aiming to destroy the Evas before Gendo can trigger Third Impact and Instrumentality under his control.

title: Yu Gi Ok
synopsis: Kaiba wants a rematch with a dead man. Yugi just wants to finish high school. Transfer student Aigami has a a grudge against them both. Time to duel!

title: GODZILLA The Planet Eater
synopsis: With the earth alliance weakened, Haruo weighs siding with the Exif, whose death cult is summoning a monster that can destroy the world.

title: Fate/Stay Night: Heaven's Feel - I. Presage Flower
synopsis: Ten years after the Holy Grail War, the battle begins again. To protect his friend Sakura and to fulfill a dying wish, one young man rises.

title: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
synopsis: When Ash tries to pick his first Pokémon on his birthday, he ends up with a stubborn Pikachu and they embark on a journey to find the legendary Ho-Oh.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins the Movie: Prisoners of the Sky
synopsis: The Seven Deadly Sins aid the Sky People against a powerful group of demons hellbent on resurrecting a demonic beast sealed over 3,000 years ago.

title: The Irregular at Magic High School The Movie: The Girl Who Summons the Stars
synopsis: Vacationing in the islands, Miyuki, Tatsuya and their friends meet a girl who holds the key to an illegal conspiracy, and she needs their help.

title: Digimon Adventure Tri. Chapter 6 'Our Future'
synopsis: With DigiWorld threatening to swallow the real world, the remaining DigiDestined must stand united to thwart Yggdrasil's path of destruction.

title: Batman Ninja
synopsis: Reimagined by Japan's finest artists, Batman must face his foes in feudal Japan when a malfunctioning Quake Engine transports them all back in time.

title: Assassination Classroom: 365 Days
synopsis: Seven years after they graduated, Nagisa and Karma return to their old classroom and reminisce about the murderous times they shared with Koro-sensei.

title: One Piece: Episode of Chopper: Bloom in the Winter, Miracle Sakura
synopsis: When Nami falls ill, the Straw Hats seek medical care for her on Drum Island. There they meet reindeer doctor Tony Tony Chopper and the Wapol pirates.

title: One Piece Film Z
synopsis: Luffy and his gang save a disillusioned Navy admiral named Z who has one goal -- to slaughter every pirate in the world, including the Straw Hats.

title: One Piece Film: Strong World
synopsis: Legendary pirate Shiki reappears in East Blue planning to destroy the World Government. When he kidnaps Nami, the Straw Hats confront a strange land.

title: One Piece: Episode of Alabasta
synopsis: Revolution is brewing in the desert country of Alabasta, but the Straw Hats and Princess Vivi know the truth: it's all a plot cooked up by Crocodile.

title: GODZILLA City on the Edge of Battle
synopsis: On Earth, Haruo and his companions make contact with the indigenous Houtua tribe. To defeat Godzilla, they set out for the old Mechagodzilla facility.

title: Fate/Grand Order -First Order-
synopsis: Discovering that humanity is facing extinction, a new recruit to the Chaldea Security Organization goes back in time in order to save the future.

title: ​Digimon Adventure Tri. Chapter 5 'Coexistence'
synopsis: Ousted from DigiWorld, the DigiDestined must evade persecution from the real world as a digivolving Meicoomon threatens to wreak havoc on both worlds.

title: Sword Art Online the Movie: Ordinal Scale
synopsis: Everyone is engrossed in a new 'augmented reality' game known as Ordinal Scale. But Kirito and his friends uncover a dark secret endangering them all.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Blood Seal - Eternal Mermaid
synopsis: Lupin is forced to try to steal the 'mermaid's scale,' a legendary artifact. Along the way he meets young would-be thief Maki and the mysterious Misa.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: F91: The Motion Picture
synopsis: Renewed conflict breaks out after a generation of peace in this continuation of the 'Mobile Suit Gundam' anime saga. To accommodate the growing population, the Earth Federation has built new space colonies.

title: The Last: Naruto the Movie
synopsis: Two years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, the fate of mankind is placed in Naruto's hands when the moon threatens a collision course with Earth.

title: Boruto: Naruto the Movie
synopsis: As the Seventh Hokage of Konoha village, Naruto is now inundated with duties, which puts a strain on his relationship with his son, Boruto

title: A Certain Scientific Railgun OVA
synopsis: During a training exercise, esper Mikoto gets the feeling that she's being watched. As her paranoia grows, her friends find she's not the only one.

title: Ghost in the Shell: Solid State Society
synopsis: Major Kusanagi quits Section 9 after a rash of refugee suicides, leaving her colleagues to battle the hacker known as the Puppeteer without her.

title: A Certain Magical Index: The Movie －The Miracle of Endymion
synopsis: Toma and Index meet a singer named Arisa whose powers are linked to a nearly-complete space elevator and a mysterious accident three years earlier.

title: 劇場版 フェアリーテイル DRAGON CRY
synopsis: The Fairy Tail Guild's quest to retrieve the deadly and destructive Dragon Cry staff forces dragon slayer Natsu to undergo a dangerous transformation.

title: Digimon Adventure tri. Chapter 4: Lost
synopsis: The DigiDestined return to a rebooted digital world where they find a distraught Meicoomon. Determined, they head out to help her reunite with Meiko.

title: BLAME!
synopsis: Inside a vast, self-replicating city bent on eliminating all life, mysterious loner Killy emerges to guide a remnant of humanity desperate to survive.

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie: The Lost Tower
synopsis: When Naruto is sent to recover a missing nin, the rogue manages to send him 20 years into the past, where he unites with his father to battle evil.

title: Rurôni Kenshin: Ishin shishi e no Requiem
synopsis: Shigure lost friends and family in the war against the Tokugawa Shogunate and is out for revenge, but one man stands in his way: Kenshin Himura.

title: Digimon Adventure tri. Chapter 3: Confession
synopsis: With Meicoomon gone, the DigiDestined struggle to prevent infected Digimon from further harming the real world, but a reboot may be the only answer.

title: Gantz:O
synopsis: Teams of recently deceased people who've been revived and given high-tech weapons must cooperate to defeat an army of monsters in Tokyo and Osaka.

title: Naruto Shippuden : Blood Prison
synopsis: Mistakenly accused of an attack on the Fourth Raikage, ninja Naruto is imprisoned in the impenetrable Hozuki Castle and his powers are sealed.

title: Attack on Titan: The Wings of Freedom
synopsis: In this second compilation film, humanity's fight against giant humanoids is complicated when a human becomes able to transform into the enemy.

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
synopsis: Set in the year 2071, this engaging animated tale follows an eclectic crew of space bounty hunters as they hunt down a biochemical terrorist on Mars.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Sweet Lost Night
synopsis: At Fujiko's behest, Lupin travels into the desert in search of a magic lamp. But the lamp isn't what it seems, and Colonel Garlic wants it too.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: The Last Job
synopsis: Lupin steals a Buddha statue on Zenigata's watch, but the evil Morgana wants to steal it from him, while the mysterious Asuka has sworn to protect it.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Crisis in Tokyo
synopsis: International thief extraordinaire Lupin the 3rd must steal a set of priceless photographic plates from a famous art dealer in this installment of the popular anime series. And this time, Goemon and Fujiko want in on the action.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Voyage to Danger
synopsis: A new adversary awaits Lupin the 3rd when his longtime foe, Det. Zenigata, is pulled from his case and reassigned to other responsibilities. But the master thief gains an accomplice when Zenigata seeks out his friendship.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
synopsis: Another installment of the anime based on the manga series by artist Kazuhiko KatM finds Lupin, the world-famous thief, and his friends on a mission to recover the fabled treasure of Harimao, a trio of statues rumored to be worth some $8 billion.

title: Lupin the 3rd: The Secret of Twilight Gemini
synopsis: Lupin holds half of a powerful diamond known as the Twilight Gemini. Knowing the other half will unlock a phenomenal treasure, he travels to Morocco in search of the prize and finds a city under siege, scheming crooks and unexpected romance.

title: Lupin the 3rd: Dragon of Doom
synopsis: A dragon figurine lost in the sunken Titanic is the target of an international race, but its history pits Goemon against Lupin and their friends.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Napoleon's Dictionary
synopsis: Pursued by Zenigata and the world's intelligence agencies, Lupin races to find his grandfather's treasure using a map hidden in Napoleon's dictionary.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: The Hemingway Papers
synopsis: Lupin lands in a war between treasure hunters, with Jigen and Goemon on opposite sides, when he tries to steal Ernest Hemingway's final manuscript.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Goodbye Lady Liberty
synopsis: Lupin's attempt to quit the criminal life is cut short when Jigen inherits information about the 'Super Egg' diamond, hidden in the Statue of Liberty.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Bank of Liberty
synopsis: A trove of Romanov gold surfaces in San Antonio and Lupin vows to steal it. But he'll have to outwit the Mafia and Rasputin's descendant to get it!

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Island of Assassins
synopsis: After Zenigata is shot with a silver Walther P38, Lupin and company investigate a group of assassins called Tarantula and their stockpile of gold.

title: Gundam Mobile Suit: Movie I: Special Edition
synopsis: The Earth Federation's last hope in its fight against the Principality of Zeon is the prototype mobile suit Gundam, piloted by civilian Amur Ray.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack
synopsis: Thirteen years have passed since the events of the original Mobile Suit Gundam series, and now peace is again threatened by a new Neo Zeon army. Armed with the Nu Gundam mobile suit, Amuro Ray and the Federation forces engage in one final battle.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space
synopsis: With the conflict's end in sight, the Earth Federation prepares to take the war into the Duchy of Zeon's home territory. Gundam pilot Amuro Ray, now a seasoned veteran, returns to space for the final battle.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam II: Soldiers of Sorrow
synopsis: The Earth Federation warship White Base and its Gundam pilot Amuro Ray struggle to make it back through enemy territory, pursued by Zeon's warriors.

title: Fate/stay night Unlimited Blade Works
synopsis: High schooler Shiro Emiya is caught up in the conflict over the Holy Grail, which can grant any wish, alongside a teen magus and her hostile servant.

title: Blood-C: The Last Dark
synopsis: Saya is part human, part monster, and has one thing on her mind: revenge. How much blood will she shed to cut down the mastermind behind her madness?

title: Digimon Adventure tri. Chapter 2: 'Determination'
synopsis: Mimi and the other DigiDestined juggle school obligations and their infected Digimon, who are causing more havoc in the nondigital world.

title: Digimon Adventure tri. Chapter 1: 'Reunion'
synopsis: Now in high school, Tai and the other DigiDestined discover that a mysterious phenomenon is infecting Digimon, turning them hostile to humans.

title: The Boy and the Beast
synopsis: A human boy runs away from his unhappy life and discovers love and friendship with a lonely beast who takes him in and trains him to be a warrior.

title: Ju Chang Ban  PSYCHO-PASS saikopasu
synopsis: In a future Japan, a network of crime-predicting surveillance tools is poised to be launched worldwide when terrorists infiltrate the system.

title: Sailor Moon SuperS the Movie: Black Dream Hole
synopsis: Queen Valdiana plots to harvest children's dreams, drawing Earth into her Black Dream Hole. The Sailor Scouts must fight for Chibi Moon and the world!

title: Sailor Moon S: The Movie
synopsis: Princess Snow Kaguya's plans to freeze the Earth are put on ice when a young astronomer finds part of her comet. The Sailor Soldiers must fight her!

title: Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie
synopsis: In the wake of World War IV and the assassination of Japan's prime minister, Maj. Motoko Kusanagi and her elite team uncover a vast cyber-conspiracy.

title: Princess Mononoke
synopsis: A prince infected with a lethal curse sets off to find a cure and lands in the middle of a battle between a mining town and the animals of the forest.

title: Sword Art Online: Extra Edition
synopsis: This year-end special features a recap as well as new content. Yui wants to see a whale so Suguha must learn to swim. A surprise waits in the water.

title: Rupan Sansei TV Speicial Nusumareta Rupan Kopi kyatto ha Manatsu no cho
synopsis: A crime boss kidnaps Lupin and forces him to agree to steal the heavily guarded Bull's Eye jewel in exchange for hostage Fujiko's life.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Seven Days Rhapsody
synopsis: Lupin plays bodyguard to a teen and Jigen reunites with an old mercenary pal. Meanwhile, Goemon and Fujiko join forces to steal a gigantic diamond.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Operation: Return the Treasure
synopsis: If Lupin and the gang can return six stolen relics to their rightful homes in time, the location of the mysterious Trick Diamond will be revealed.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: The Elusive Mist
synopsis: Lupin, Goemon, Jigen and Zenigata are sent back in time 500 years by a revenge seeker from the future who bears a grudge against Jigen's decendant.

title: Rupan Sansei TV Speicial Arukatorazu Konekusyon
synopsis: Lupin and his gang follow a lead on the whereabouts of sunken treasure in San Francisco Bay, but discover a secret society is following them.

title: Lupin the 3rd TV Special: Tactics of the Angels
synopsis: After Lupin and his crew steal a UFO fragment from Area 51, they find themselves targets of an all-female terrorist group, the Bloody Angels.

title: Lupin the 3rd: The Columbus Files
synopsis: When thieves try to steal a file from Fujiko that shows a treasure location, she burns it and escapes. Now Lupin must find her before the thieves do.

title: Lupin the 3rd: Missed by a Dollar
synopsis: Outbid by one dollar for a modest ring at an auction, Lupin plots to steal it from the winner, knowing it's linked to something of far greater worth.

title: Lupin the 3rd: Episode 0: The First Contact
synopsis: Jigen tells a reporter the story of how he, Lupin, Fujiko, Goemon and Inspector Zenigata first met and became entangled in one another's lives.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
synopsis: A year after he left the Band of the Hawk, Guts rejoins them in an epic battle to vanquish the God Hand and save Griffith from a hellish fate.

title: BERSERK: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
synopsis: For three years, Guts believed his mission was to pursue Griffith's dream together with him. But in order to become Griffith's equal and truly be called his friend, Guts realizes he will have to leave the Band of the Hawk.

title: Paprika
synopsis: Reality and the dream world are on a collision course after a device that can record dreams is stolen from a psychiatric research facility.

title: Sailor Moon R
synopsis: When bewitching alien Kisenian threatens to replace the solar system's positive energy with negative waves, youthful adventuress Sailor Moon and her four fellow Sailors jump into action in this feature-length film based on the popular anime series.

title: The Place Promised in Our Early Days
synopsis: Japan is under two regimes after the country's loss in World War II. Hokkaido remains under Japanese rule while America holds the rest.

title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
synopsis: In the year 2032, a crime-fighting cyborg investigates a murder spree committed by 'gynoids,' human-like female robots designed for pleasure.

title: Legend of the Millennium Dragon
synopsis: As an apocalyptic war rages between humans and demons, teenaged Jun travels far back in time to find his destiny in this action-packed anime epic.

title: Persona 3 the Movie: #2 Midsummer Knight's Dream
synopsis: When Makoto arrives in Iwatodai City, he unleashes the strange force called Persona to draw his friends into battle with the agents of darkness.

title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: The Will of Fire
synopsis: When four out of five ninja villages are destroyed, the leader of the one spared tries to find the true culprit and protect his land.

title: Ghost in the Shell
synopsis: In this cyberpunk anime classic, a government cyborg is tasked with apprehending a hacker who's taking over the minds of computer-enhanced humans.

title: Naruto the Movie 3: Guardians of the Crescent Moon Kingdom
synopsis: Exuberant ninja Naruto teams up with his pals Sakura and Kakashi to escort Prince Michiru and his son, Hikaru, to the Crescent Moon kingdom.

title: Naruto Shippuden The Movie: Bonds
synopsis: When strange ninjas ambush the village of Konohagakure, it's up to adolescent ninja Naruto and his long-missing pal, Sasuke, to save the planet.

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie
synopsis: The adventures of adolescent ninja Naruto Uzumaki continue as he's tasked with protecting a priestess from a demon -- but to do so, he must die.

title: Bleach the Movie: Hell Verse
synopsis: When a group of vicious Sinners plots to escape from this eternal prison in Hell, they discover that Substitute Soul Reaper Ichigo is the key to their freedom. The Sinners launch an attack and in the process kidnap Ichigo's younger sister.

title: Bleach The Movie: Fade to Black
synopsis: When his mind is fogged by a scimitar-weilding stranger, Mayuri destroys his laboratory, unleashing a cloud of reishi that lays waste to the Seiretei.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
synopsis: Loner Guts is recruited by Griffith and his band of mercenaries, but their ensuing success as a full-fledged army could lead to a horrible fate.

title: Akira
synopsis: In this animated film based on the anime series, two childhood friends are pulled into the underworld of Neo-Tokyo and forced to fight for survival.

title: Fairy Tail the Movie: Phoenix Priestess
synopsis: Natsu and his powerful team of wizards take on an evil prince who unleashes an ancient curse in his pursuit of immortality.

title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
synopsis: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura learn they'll be protecting an actress from being hurt while making her next film, but it turns out she's a princess.

title: Naruto the Movie 2: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
synopsis: While on a mission to return a missing pet, Naruto and two fellow ninjas are ambushed by brutal knights led by the enigmatic Temujin.

title: Harlock: Space Pirate
synopsis: Determined to keep the malevolent Gaia Coalition from ruling the universe, a mysterious loner cruises the skies and boldly attacks enemy spaceships.

title: InuYasha: The Movie: Affections Touching Across Time
synopsis: A powerful demon has been sealed away for 200 years. But when the demon's son is awakened, the fate of the world is in jeopardy.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 4: Fire on the Mystic Island
synopsis: Ai, a young half-demon who has escaped from Horai Island to try to help his people, returns with potential saviors InuYasha, Sesshomaru and Kikyo.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
synopsis: The Great Dog Demon beaqueathed one of the Three Swords of the Fang to each of his two sons. Now the evil power of the third sword has been awakened.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 2: The Castle Beyond the Looking Glass
synopsis: With their biggest foe seemingly defeated, InuYasha and his friends return to everyday life. But the peace is soon shattered by an emerging new enemy.
